word:
Temperance in Diet. 

                          Sunnyside, Cooranbong, N. S. W., Aug. 30. 

Dear Brother and Sister:-- 


            . . . . . 
     You have the light which the Lord has given our people and kept before them for many years. The Lord does not say Yea and Nay to his people, but Yes and Amen. I will send you the testimonies given to others upon the subject of health reform. This is a large subject. I am now revising the book entitled. Christian Temperance."
